_aChangeLog.text: New special sound of electrical discharge
Added some 3D models & created some brush objects in special places
Re-adjusting all sounds of electrical discharges
Corrected the positions of a lot of objects
Transforming the ladder (near the pool) into a physical object

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
- Made a new special sound of electrical discharge.
- Add a pedestal to electric generators.
- Re-adjusting all sounds of electrical discharges.
- Now the ladder near the pool will fall down during the explosion, as in the block with electric generators.
- Added some 3D models & created some brush objects in special places.
- Added “nodraw” & "block light" textures, where it was necessary.
- Corrected the positions of a lot of objects.
- Other bugs fixed.

_aChangeLog.text: Road system for virtual city of the holographic panorama
New row of flickering lighs in block with supercomputer
Correcting the image on monitors on the walls
Added “nodraw” textures & “clip” brushes where it was necessary
Corrected the positions of some objects

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
- Added a system of roads for the virtual city of the holographic panorama.
- New row of flickering colored lighs in the block with the broken supercomputer.
- Monitor`s bug fixed – correcting the image on monitors on the walls, as seen by the virtual camera.
- Added some missing decals.
- Added “nodraw” textures, where it was necessary and also “clip” brushes.
- Corrected the positions of some objects.
- Other little bugs fixed.

_sText:
Hi! I present to you my new map "De_Quadroshock" for "Counter-Strike: Source" (-bomb/defuse mission).
I worked much on this map and hope for you will be exciting to play. -)
I am game developer, but in such way I accumulate experience in level-design and keep fit.
The map is made from scratch and have original concept and design.
Also here are totally destroyable columns. And walls with physicalized destroyable bricks, which can be thrown down.
Plus only for this map I made something like a holographic panorama of an invented secret city (-Hi for City-17, from HL2 ! :) ).

Background story:
An attempt to attack was committed on the underground bunker of a secret military-scientific complex. The government is deeply shocked by this unexpected attack on such a secret complex. Nobody knows how the terrorists came in there. But the first attack was stopped!
Now the second wave of attack is expected, much hotter.
It is supposed that the purpose of the terrorists is to destroy with bombs two points in the bunker :
1. The structural column at point A – above it is located the biological weapons lab.
2. The power generators at point B. Also above is the floor with the chemical weapons lab.
The bunker itself is made up of 4 main parts with an additional central block where a supercomputer is located.
Attention! The supercomputer in the central block was already damaged in the first attack. Avoid electrical discharges from supercomputer.
You can also use the ventilation system for suddenly attack.
And use hot traps – explosive barrels with dangerous objects around them – fry the ass of your virtual opponents!
Powerful weapons and crafty tactics will make you cool and dangerous.
Have a good hunting! :)

Press on "Manual Download" and just download the archive. :)
